Hey home seekers, here is an amazing offer awaiting your attention!! Up for sale is a ready to move 2 bhk apartment in hiland greens - One of the premium residential projects in maheshtala, kolkata. Approved by leading banks, this property comes with a freehold type of ownership hence you can be assured of making a worthwhile deal.
Facing the south-West direction, this 2 bhk apartment is on the 3rd floor of a 14-Storey building and adheres to the vaastu guidelines. The flat spans across a super area of 712 sqft whereas the carpet area is 447 sqft and is thoughtfully crafted making the optimum use of the available space. 
Unfurnished, this flat consists of 2 comfy bedrooms, 2 western-Style bathrooms with geyser points, a living cum dining area, and a kitchen with a utility area. Also, there is a balcony linked to the hall and one can get an unblocked view of the road from here. To continue, offering extra comfort; One of the bathrooms here is ensuite with a bedroom whereas the other is for common use. Talking of the flooring part; Vitrified and ceramic tiles are used in various parts of the flat, which enhances the overall aesthetic appeal. Facilities one covered parking is allotted to this property and basic facilities like a regular supply of water, power backup, lifts, manned security and cctv cameras for close vigilance are provided. Locality this property is adjacent to bata factory and it is easily accessible via sampriti flyover. Amenities like schools, hospitals, malls, etc are within a range of 1-2km while banks/atms, etc are close by so residents here can fulfil everyday needs without any hassle. Public transport is readily available and the railway station is 4km from here so conveyance will be at ease for the residents here.

Main bedroom has one teak wooden double bed, 3 steel almirah, 1 dressing table and chester drawers. Second bedroom has one single bed, 2 wooden almirahs (One teak wood almirah). 
Dining cum drawing room has 4 sofas with central table, lcd tv, dining tables with 4 segun wooden chairs, 2 showcase and carpet. 
Both bathrooms are fully equipped with all accessories. 
Kitchen has refrigerator, high end aqua guard installed, gas stove with 2 cylinders, fully equipped with utensils and chinaware. 
Washing machine is also installed in the balcony. All windows have safely grills and entrance door and balcony doors have strong safety collapsible gate. 
All rooms have ceiling fans and light fixtures. This flat also has separate electric meter installed and is fully ready for occupancy. 
The realtech curiocity complex is a secure enclosed complex with security guard at the gate, and also has swimming pool and club for home owners. 
All room pictures are enclosed.
Furnishings and amenities:
This impeccable house is spread across an area of 1020 sq. Ft. And is a furnished unit. It consists of wardrobes, beds, exhaust fan, curtains, fridge, dining table, stove, tv, microwave, sofa, washing machine, lights and fans. There is plenty of room for the whole family to enjoy. description:
Welcome to your dream abode nestled in the upscale neighborhood of alipore, kolkata. This stunning duplex flat offers an exceptional blend of opulence, thoughtful design, and adherence to vaastu principles, making it the perfect sanctuary for those seeking a harmonious living environment. Property highlights 
 Impeccable interiors: Step into a world of elegance as you enter this duplex flat. The interiors have been meticulously crafted with a keen eye for detail, featuring premium materials, chic fixtures, and a seamless fusion of contemporary and traditional design elements. Abundance of space: Spread across two levels, this spacious duplex offers generous living areas, allowing you to create distinct zones for relaxation, entertainment, and family gatherings. The clever layout optimizes the available space, ensuring a comfortable and functional living experience. Vaastu-Compliant design: Built with vaastu principles in mind, this flat is believed to promote positive energy flow and harmony within the living space. From the orientation of rooms to the arrangement of furniture, every aspect has been carefully considered to create a harmonious environment. Modern amenities: Indulge in a host of modern amenities that enhance your comfort and convenience. The flat is equipped with state-Of-The-Art fixtures, including a well-Appointed kitchen, contemporary bathrooms, ensuring a luxurious lifestyle. Prime location: Situated in the prestigious alipore neighborhood, this duplex flat enjoys proximity to renowned schools, hospitals, shopping centers, and entertainment hubs. Experience the convenience of urban living while residing in a tranquil and exclusive locale. Property details - Spacious duplex flat
- Thoughtfully designed interiors
- Vaastu-Compliant layout
- Multiple living and dining areas
- Well-Appointed kitchen
- Contemporary bathrooms
- Modern amenities
- Prime location in alipore, kolkataDon't miss this exceptional opportunity to own a duplex flat that combines luxurious living, breathtaking interiors, and adherence to vaastu principles. Experience a harmonious and blissful lifestyle in one of kolkata's most sought-After neighborhoods.

description:
3bhk flat/apartment for sale in hiland park, em bypass, kolkata south, kolkataWelcome to your dream home! We are delighted to present this exquisite semi furnished 3bhk residential apartment situated in hiland park, em bypass, kolkata south, kolkata. This meticulously designed apartment offers a perfect blend of style, comfort, and convenience for modern living.Property features:
Size and layout: Sprawling across a carpet area of 1328 sqft, this 3bhk apartment provides ample space for a comfortable and spacious living experience.
 The thoughtfully planned layout encompasses a well-Defined living room,3 cozy bedrooms, a contemporary kitchen, 2 well-Appointed bathrooms, and 1 balcony with a servant room. The living room is designed to be the heart of the home, offering an inviting space for relaxation and entertainment.
Natural lighting and ventilation: Large windows throughout the apartment ensure an abundance of natural light, creating a bright and airy atmosphere. Proper ventilation enhances airflow, maintaining a fresh and pleasant living environment.
Prime location: This residential apartment is located in a highly sought-After neighborhood, known for its convenience and connectivity. description:
3bhk 2baths residential apartment for sale in bengal shelters sisirkunja, madhyamgram, kolkata north, kolkata
Sisirkunja is bengal shelters second dream project on national highway 34 at the northern fringe of greater kolkata, at madhyamgram. Here nature is in its glory a world away from the din bustle of the town still not far away from it. This property is located at the most prime location near madhyamgram crossing. It is 6 km from airport, well connected with central kolkata and 2 km from madhyamgram railway station.
It happens to be in a sound locality within a complex. The property provides you the ease and convenience of comfort living. It has the facility of security guards, cctv camera, car parking, 24 hours power backup, continuous water supply and so on. 
Some of the specifications of the flat are as follows.
 Foundation structure: Rcc structure
 Walls: Plaster of paris inside the flats. For external paints anti fungal emulation paint used. 
 Window: Aluminum frame windows with matching glass 
 Doors: Main door is polished panel door. Inside doors are waterproof flash doors 
 Flooring: Living & dining - Rectified ceramic tiled flooring. Bed rooms and other areas - Standard ceramic tiled flooring. Kitchen & toilet - Standard ceramic tiles in floors and glazed tiles on walls.
 Water supply: Water supply is through concealed pipeline with standard fittings. Garbage & sewerage system has been designed keeping in mind the health awareness of the resident. 
 Electrical installation: In each flat, electricity to be provided with concealed copper wiring and high-Class fittings. There are adequate electrical points in each room. 
 Lift: Of reputed brand
This property is unfurnished and ready to move in. The flat is in its original builder made condition and the buyer shall have the opportunity to modify the interiors as per his / her own choice. Flat being east facing, the rooms are fully ventilated and have abundance of sunlight coming in. The property ensures zero wastage of area and gives ample space to move around freely and to keep essentials effortlessly, emerging as a perfect place for a modern living. All basic recreation amenities such as gym, park, club house and play area is at close vicinity within the complex.
One can enjoy all major public amenities such as atm, banks and market. Being located on nh 34, public transport is at close proximity to the property.
To know more details, click on contact owner.

description: Nestled in kasba, kolkata is a 2 bhk apartment available for sale at a competitive price. Aptly kept, this property is in a calm and friendly neighborhood and is worth considering to settle down with your much-Adored family. So, hurry up to book this property property specifications resting on the advantageous first floor, this 2 bhk apartment is ideal for families with kidselderly people as they get to move around comfortably without being dependent on the lift. Being unfurnished is another plus point as residents will have complete freedom to customise the abode as per their tastes and needs. Bright and airy, this flat is brilliantly configured and promotes good vibes for the residents. Talking of the layout, the flat encompasses 2 bedrooms opening onto a common balcony, 2 western-Style bathrooms, a spacious living dining area, and a kitchen. Moreover, one of the bathrooms is attached to the master bedroom and the other is for common use. Mosaic tiles which are durable and have a long-Lasting shine are used for the flooring of all rooms. Facilities the safety of vehicles will not be a concern as a garage is available for the same. To ensure the well-Being of residents there is a security guard downstairs. Further, the locality is supported by cesc power supply so the area faces rare power cuts. Locality this property is in a well-Developed locality and one can find acropolis mall, gariahat market, ruby general hospital, fortis hospital, and south point school in the vicinity. The locality has excellent transport facilities and the bus stop and auto stand can be reached within 1 min walk. On the whole residents here can be assured of living a hassle-Free lifestyle.

description:
Very auspicious property - Kids graduated, got good jobs, got married, had kids from this house. Selling as we have relocated to a different city and it is becoming difficult to remotely maintain the property.
Property near santoshpur lake - Very well connected to nearby hospital, corporation bazar, shops, banks, atms. 10 mins drive to ajaynagar or jadavpur. 20 mins walking distance to jadavpur railway station.
Very well maintained as you can see from the pictures. Owner is currently in a different city - If interested, please reach out to schedule a visit to see the interior as the flat is currently locked. But prospective buyers are welcome to come and see the building from outside already. 
Flat is fully furnished - Can also sell furniture and almost new appliances (E.G. Fridge, washing machine, tv, acs, microwave etc.) at additional price.
Flat has got ac and inverter wiring done. Has 2 electric meters to distribute load. Has 2 entry/exit wooden doors. Collapsible gates installed to protect each door. No water issues.
The flat is spread across the entire ground floor of the building with a backyard which can be used for gardening or bike parking. We do not have any parking as it is possible to park on the road. Parking on rent are also available in the neighborhood.
We can negotiate if the buyer is willing to purchase immediately. Prefer to directly sell to buyer - I.E. No brokerage.

description:
This is your chance to own a 3 bhk residential apartment in godrej prakriti, sodepur, kolkata north, kolkata where luxury comes with affordability.
Basic details:
You will love this bright and spacious 3 bedroom apartment with 2 bathrooms, modular kitchen, spacious hall and 2 balconies. The balcony offers a great view and is a place to enjoy at any time. This house provides ample natural light and has good ventilation that invites comfort. 
The property is vaastu compliant.
Furnishings and amenities:
This impeccable house is spread across an area of 1359 sq. Ft. And is a semi furnished unit. It consists of wardrobes, beds, exhaust fan, geysers, curtains, fridge, dining table, stove, chimney, tv, microwave, sofa, washing machine, lights and fans. There is plenty of room for the whole family to enjoy. The unit has spacious interiors and 24*7 water facility. 
The amenities are designed to make your life easy, exciting and luxurious. The society boasts of manicured landscaping and includes lifts, intercom facility, security/fire alarm, maintenance staff, security personnel, visitor parking, swimming pool, gym, clubhouse, rainwater harvesting, piped gas, water storage, waste disposal and park.
The property is a quality construction. 
Location:
The prime location provides residents with access to the very best that this city has to offer. The property is situated close to all the basic amenities. It is close to the main road making it highly accessible.
-Major banks and atms within proximity
-Schools within a close radius
-Easy access to public transportWait no more and schedule a tour today.
For more details, kindly contact the owner.

description:
Property is conveniently located 50m from hazra road and 500m from triangular park with all available public transport services. The complex has 2 towers and 7 blocks with multilevel physical and digital security systems. It has modern clubhouse facilities with heated swimming pool, well equipped gym, billiards, carom, table tennis, yoga and meditation rooms. Plenty of inside and outside well guarded children play areas. For private functions there are 2 ac banquets and 4 furnished guest rooms.
In the tower, there is ac reception cum waiting hall with 2 elevators for occupants and 1 for service personnel. It has 2 staircases and permissible fire fighting equipments. There are 2 service toilets in every floor of the tower.
The flat is a square shaped unit with 3 sides open (South, east and north). The exit from the flat is from north. Extremely well ventilated flat with plenty of natural light. There is ample space between 2 towers with plenty of air circulation and adequate privacy. As part of interior designing, floors are laid with vitrified tiles, false ceiling with designer, multicoloured lights and wall to wall cabinets. Open modular kitchen (90s.Ft) fitted with chimney and water purifier. Living and dining areas (425s.Ft) is overlooking the clubhouse and manicured lawn with 2 split acs. Very spacious master bedroom (370s.Ft) with 2 widows (South and east)and attached toilet and split ac. Bedroom 2 (170s.Ft) with 1 window (s) and attached toilet fitted with split ac. Bedroom 3 (155 s.Ft) with 2 windows in e and n, has a window ac and shared toilet with master bathroom. Wall washrooms are (50 s.Ftapprox) each. Bathroom walls are fitted with ceramic tiles, modern bath and sanitary wares and storage geysers.

address: New Town, New Town, Kolkata East, Kolkata
description:
Lushness & lavishness awaits at one place for you, as here is the most enthralling 3bhk flat up for sale and is situated in one of the high-End societies named rishi ecoview in new town, kolkata. 
Note: 3 sides open  east, north & west.
Property specifications  
Every part of this flat right from interiors to exteriors & flooring to specifications is tastefully designed as per the contemporary needs of occupants, thereby making this property worth purchasing.
Spanning across 1739sqft of a super area, this vaastu compliant flat faces towards the south direction and comes with freehold ownership rights.
 
Comfortably rested on the 6th floor of the 7-Storeyed building, this unfurnished flat comprises 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 1 balcony, 1 study room, living cum dining area and a regular kitchen.
Designed in a western style & outfitted with geyser provisions, 2 bathrooms are attached to 2 of the bedrooms whereas 1 bathroom is common. Overlooking the eco park (This is largest park in the india), the balcony is connected to the drawing room.
To give an aesthetic look, this entire flat is embellished with the wooden and vitrified tiles on the flooring.
Facilities
The chief amenities & facilities such as 2 covered parking (Can accommodate 3 cars), reserved parking, visitor parking, 2 lifts, rain water harvesting, club house, swimming pool, gymnasium, park, banquet hall, conference room, jogging & strolling track, private garage, water front, water storage, intercom facility, maintenance staff, waste disposal, internet/wi-Fi connectivity, ro water system, 24 hours borewell water supply, 100% power backup, security guard and cctv cameras are available here.
Locality
Within a radius of 1 to 2kms, you can find all the essential social amenities such as prestigious schools, reputed hospitals, famous shopping malls, supermarkets, renowned banks and atms from this residential property.
For hassle-Free commuting, you can access the airport at 10kms, the railway station at 5kms, the metro station at 300m and several modes of public transportation within 200 mtr from this flat.

description: A premium residential semi-Furnished, ready-To-Move-In 6 year old apartment on 9th floor of g+12 storied 7 block complex. Located on the main diamond harbour road, just next to thakurpukur metro station. The complex is a landmark by itself in the locality with shops like reliance trendz, bata in the frontage. The flat is north open with mesmerizing view of the kolkata skyline, overviewing the vidyasagar bridge, eden gardens. This is a very peaceful society, ideal for families. Many essential amenities are there like jogging track, children's play area, ac club house, ac gym, ac indoor games room, ac community hall for functions. Maintenance & security work is regularly audited by independent auditors.Many good schools are in the vicinity, like dps, vivekananda mission, gems academia, orchid international etc. There is a farmer's market just next door, where one can get fresh vegetables at very economical rates, to take care of one's daily supplies. All 3 bedrooms are fitted with window acs. The flat has designer false ceilings with aesthetic designer lights, all walls painted with asian paints royal emulsion paints, wall-To-Wall furnishing work done through decofur (Minto park).2 washrooms fitted with 25l geysers, exhaust fans, marble racks in each washrooms. Bathroom windows were modified to make it more aesthetic.The kitchen is fitted with modular accessories with imported hettich hinges and kutchina auto-Clean chimney. Ro+uv aqaugaurd water purifier installed. 1 balcony overlooking the beautiful city skyline.

description: 3 bhk flat in multistory apartment for resale in diamond city west at 18 ho chi minh sarani, bakultala-Behala. Diamond city west is a well planned society that offers a pleasant living experience to its residents. The flat comprises 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms one kitchen, 2 balconies and one open terrace of 96 sq. Ft. This is a corner flat which is open from three sides and very airy and sunny. There is one covered car parking also available with this flat. Diamond city west has total 10 towers with swimming pool, gym, club house, senior citizen room, yoga room, two community halls, games room, play area for children, park and one temple. The ambiance of the complex is very pleasant with greeneries and flower garden. Essential commodities like grocery, medicine shop, atm etc are within the complex. Vegetable & non-Veg market is at walking distance. Buses from several reputed schools come to the complex to pick up and drop children of the society. This 3 bhk flat in kolkata south is your opportunity to be a part of this community.

description: Situated in nager bazar, kolkata north, sukanti is a well planned society that offers a pleasant living experience to its residents. This 2 bhk flat in kolkata north is your opportunity to be a part of this community. The flat is south-Facing. The floor plan additionally contains 2 bedroom(s), 2 bathrooms and 1 balcony. All in all, the flat is spread over a super built up area of 963 sq.Ft. The flat has a total of 4 floors and this property is situated on 2nd floor. Being a ready to move project, you can expect immediate possession of this 0-1 year old property. The floor of this flat is beautifully designed using ceramic flooring, giving the flat an alluring look. Moreover, this property offers close proximity to important landmarks such as close to metro station, close to market, close to mall and close to highway. The society is well equipped with many modern amenities, including lift(s). The residential project is well equipped to meet all your water needs through access to municipal corporation supply.

description:
Location
This is a flat on the 2nd floor of a stand-Alone building. The best thing about the flat is it's location. The locality is very peaceful; Far enough to avoid the noise and pollution of the main road and market but close enough to reach all the facilities within 2/3 minutes.
Communication: 
The flat is just 2 to 2 minutes walking distance from jessore road; 5/6 minutes; 5/6 minutes from the proposed under-Construction airport metro station. A subway is also proposed to the airport metro station which is 2 minutes from this flat. Schools, markets, atms, and banks, all are within 2/3 minute walking distance.
Train - Birati and dumdum rail statin
Metro- Dakshinewar, dumdum
Road - Jessore road, vip road, belgharia expressway
Entertainment:
For entertainment and dining out, you will have a lot of choices based on your requirements. Citi centre 2, star mall, echo park, diamond plaza and dakshineswar temple are a few spots where you can spend quality time with your family.
